text: The men's triple jump at the 2018 European Athletics Championships took place at the Olympic Stadium on 10 and 12 August. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2018 European Athletics Championships |- |World record | |18.29 m |Gothenburg, Sweden |7 August 1995 |- |European record | |18.29 m |Gothenburg, Sweden |7 August 1995 |- |Championship record | |17.99 m |Budapest, Hungary |23 August 1998 |- |World Leading | | 17.95 m |Doha, Qatar |4 May 2018 |- |European Leading | | 17.95 m |Doha, Qatar |4 May 2018 |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" !
